title: Horse Rider
fullContent: Home› HorseHorse RiderBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHorse Rider is the game where you take your horse to competitions. You can experience the chance to be an equestrian in horse sports. Begin the journey as you jump over hurdles and race against the rivals to win the courses. Try to complete the laps while you are increasing the speed of the horse to reach the first place.Championship Tournement There are 3 tournments and a lot of levels• New York Tournment • Oman Tournment • Dubai Tournment Select a player There are 5 players/horses, one better than other• John• Paul • PII • XLL • MMLSelect Laps• The laps can be easy/medium/expert.Level Up Knock Out • Complete the lap in a specific period of time Horse Rider Controls: • W or up arrow to speed up • Space to jumpThis article was updated on February 20, 20243DAnimalFreeHorseRacingSimulatorSports
